EIC1_24_Req03.EIC1_24_Req03

Class CovidSciDiscoveries

  • java.lang.Object
    • EIC1_24_Req03.EIC1_24_Req03.CovidSciDiscoveries

  • public class CovidSciDiscoveries
extends java.lang.Object

    Covid19 Scientific Discoveries

    This class serves the purpose of reading PDF files from the ScientificArticles folder and build an HTML table with the extracted metadata from those files.

    Author:
    MargaridaCosta

    • Constructor Detail

      • CovidSciDiscoveries

        public CovidSciDiscoveries()

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

        Main method

        First, the metadata inside the XML file from the resource folder is extracted, if exists (extractXMLFileMetadata(File)).

        Secondly, each PDF file inside the resource folder is verified to check if its metadata was already extracted via XML file or still needs to be read (verifyScientificArticles(String)).

        Then, with all the information read the HTML table can be created with all the information (createHTMLTable()).

        Finally, a XML file is created with all the data present in the HTML table to aid faster consulting in the future (createXMLFile(String)).

        Parameters:
        args - - first argument references the resource folder path (folder with the Scientific Article PDF files)
